sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 10.9%.
Year to date, Microsoft registers a 14.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 1.1%.
Chevron is lower by about 19.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Nike ( NKE ), trading down 1.0%, and Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading up 3.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
